Text: OPT OUT. You may block your information from future sharing, free of charge, by visiting our Remove my Info page.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text:
WHAT PERSONALLY IDENTIFIABLE INFORMATION DOES THE COMPANY COLLECT?
A. Categories of Personally Identifiable Information. We collect the following information as follows:
i. Free Unregistered Users of the Site:
• IP Address
• Browser type
• Email correspondence
ii. Registered Users of the Site:
• IP Address
• Browser information
• Account email, name and company name as submitted by User
• Log of account activity and searches run
• Email correspondence
iii. Consumer Data that is in our consumer data database for site search results:
We collect public data from federal, state and local government agencies and from non-government public data sources like telephone listings for site search results.
• Consumer names
• Consumer addresses
• Consumer phone numbers
• Consumer email addresses
• Consumer employer or occupation data
• Consumer date of birth information
• Name of public data source
• Date of record collected
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Privacy Policy Modifications and Updates. If we modify or update this privacy policy, we will notify you by posting the changes here and updating the page's Last Updated date.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text: WHAT ADDITIONAL INFORMATION DOES COMPANY COLLECT?\nA. AUTOMATIC COLLECTION. Our servers automatically recognize and collect your IP addresses (the number assigned to computers on the Internet). No personal information about you is revealed in this process. We may, however, track how long you are on the Site, the pages you visit, your IP address, the results of actions you undertake, the keywords you use to find the Site and other information detailing your use of the Site. The Site may also gather anonymous aggregate data for all visitors that does not personally identify you, but that may be helpful for marketing purposes or for improving the services we offer.\nB. COOKIES. We use standard first and third party cookies. You can choose whether to accept cookies by changing the settings on your browser. However, if you choose to disable this function, your experience at our Site may be diminished and some features may not work as they were intended.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: WHAT DOES COMPANY DO WITH COLLECTED INFORMATION?\nA. PERSONAL INFORMATION. We use the personally identifiable information you submit to monitor and improve our site. We do not share your personal information with third parties with the exception of third party services that we use to run, maintain and analyze the Site. These parties do not market to you. We may use your personal information to track, identify and investigate illegal activity or suspected violations of our Terms.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: We do not share your personal information with third parties with the exception of third party services that we use to run, maintain and analyze the Site.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: B. ANONYMOUS INFORMATION. We use anonymous information to analyze our Site traffic. We may use anonymous information in combination with personal information to track, identify and to investigate fraud or suspected violations of our Terms. In addition, we may use anonymous IP addresses to help diagnose problems with our server, to administer our Site, or to display the content according to your preferences.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: C. DISCLOSURE OF PERSONAL INFORMATION. We may disclose personal information if required to do so by law or in the good-faith belief that such action is necessary to (1) conform to the edicts of the law or comply with legal process served on Company or its parent company, subsidiaries or affiliates, (2) protect ours or others rights, property or safety, or (3) act under exigent circumstances to protect the safety of the public or users of the Site.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Google and Twitter can track you through this Site as we use their services for social media and analytics purposes.
